definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: We dont accept parcels sealed with Scotch tape.
sentences.chinese: 我們不接受用透明膠封口的包裹。

sentences.english: It forms a clear gel which will not retrograde on stand.
sentences.chinese: 形成一種透明膠，靜置時該膠不會退化。

sentences.english: The clear plastic reservoir makes it easy to monitor seed levels.
sentences.chinese: 透明膠水庫可以方便地監測種子水平。

sentences.english: I also wrapped tape around the back of the handle to hold the paper down.
sentences.chinese: 我還用透明膠繞了把手一圈，好讓紙貼着把手。

sentences.english: Gift baskets are wrapped using cellophane as well as some scotch tape to close the sides.
sentences.chinese: 禮籃包裝用玻璃紙，以及一些透明膠帶關閉兩側。

sentences.english: The compound semiconductor bare chips are coated by the transparent adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 透明膠材包覆所述多個化合物半導體裸片。

sentences.english: This knob is only held on by sellotape.
sentences.chinese: 這個旋鈕只是用透明膠帶固定住的。

sentences.english: At home, she covered both sides of the photo with strips of transparent tape to keep it safe.
sentences.chinese: 回到家，她把照片的四邊用透明膠帶包好，以防磨損。

sentences.english: A large clear plastic bottle off of which you can cut the top.
sentences.chinese: 大型透明膠瓶起飛的，你可削減頂部。

definition: felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
